tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, something received, i.e. (mentally) instruction (whether on the part of the teacher or hearer); also (in an active and sinister sense) inveiglement

tokens.resolved_gloss: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
